about.title:
Hello, I’m Raoul Gaillard.
I’m looking for a great internship.
about.content:
I’m a 21 years old french student at Hetic based in Paris. I love building interfaces and code interactive productions.
I’m looking for a 6 months internship from July to December. I will love to work in New York or San Francisco this summer.

I had two internships at Stinkstudios Paris in 2015 and 2016. I love interactive design, development and building electric skateboards.
